name: Alec Bradley - Black Market Vandal - The Con Toro
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley's follow-up to the acclaimed 2011 release, Black Market. Alan Rubin brings to the world: Black Market Vandal. These cigars pack a four-country blend of long-filler tobacco with a secret special tobacco leaf that some believe is the secret to the entire stick. Outside the 6.2" x 54 toro, you'll notice the Nicaraguan wrapper outside a Sumatra binder that helps deliver a lot of spice and pepper.
